title: Police Lyrics Haridas Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Police
Singer: Prabhu Pandala
Music: Vijay Antony
Movie: Haridas		 .
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words

Neranja manasu unnakkuthaan magamaayi
unna nenachuputta kedudhal ellaam sugamaagi

Maraigalum vidai sollumadi magamaayi
kannil thottiyamkulam theriyudhadi magamaayi

Uchiveyil rotila naanga
karuvaada kaayirom, police
Thoppikulla vervayila
thopparayaa nenaiyirom .. police

Ennaa vazhaka vazhurom,
ennaathuku vaazhurom
Indha policekaaran vazhkaikulla ponaa
vandi vandiya kottuthada gaana ..

College-la student ellaam
kallaeduthu adikuraan
ada busu daynu trainu daynu
oorvalaama nadathuraan

Mandhiringa varaanganu kaaka vachi
kolluraan
ada rowdy kooda enngala paathu maamaanu
solluraan

Aalunkatchi aala adjust panni ponum
adhir katchi aala ulla thooki ponum
ellaarukum sangam vachirukkaan inga
engalukku mattum oodhu raanga sanga

Police-kaaran thoppathaan
un kannukellaam theriyudhu
naanga padum kastamellaam
yaarukuda puriyudhu,..

Thirudan kooda vazhuraan
sugamaaga jeyilula
indha police kaaran pozhapu mattum
manda kaayudhu veyilula

Day n Night duty,
thitturaa pondaati
kudumbam pulla kutti
muzhikudhadaa maati

Policenu sonnaa peru romba perusu
maasa kadaisi aana
wihoutu en purseu

Uchiveyil rotila naanga
karuvaada kaayirom, police
Thoppikulla vervayila
thopparayaa nenaiyirom .. police

Ennaa vazhaka vazhurom,
ennaathuku vaazhurom
enga thuppaakiyil thoongudhada thota
thirudan kooda kaaturaaney tata..English Translation
I tried my best :)
[english lyric]
